credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Waistcoat
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery, silk foundation, linen back
Technique: satin, stem and knot stitches plain weave
description: Gentleman's embroidered waistcoat with standing collar, straight hem, pocket welts and covered buttons. Embroidered in polychrome silks in more than twenty colors. Over-all spot pattern of flowers and insects, grasshoppers, caterpillars and insects at lower edge.
name: Waistcoat
